statements: UPDATE digital_nomads_contact_information SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE digital_nomads_contact_information SET phone_number='123-456-7890', location='Remote' WHERE id='456e7890-e12a-34b5-c678-901234567890';

UPDATE digital_nomads_contact_information SET full_name='John Doe', email='johndoe@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890', location='New York', skills='{"programming": ["Python", "JavaScript"]}', interests='{"music": ["guitar", "piano"]}' WHERE id='e4eaaaf2-d142-11e1-b3e4-080027620cdd';

UPDATE digital_nomads_contact_information SET location='Los Angeles', email='janedoe@example.com', interests='{"sports": ["soccer", "tennis"]}', skills='{"design": ["Photoshop", "Illustrator"]}', full_name='Jane Doe', phone_number='987-654-3210' WHERE id='f5aac5f4-d142-11e1-b3e4-080027620cdd';
UPDATE contacts SET email='john.doe@example.com', skills='Programming' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE connections SET connection_type='Friend' WHERE from_id=100 AND to_id=101 AND connection_date='2022-01-01';
UPDATE contacts SET location='New York', skills='Java, Python' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE connections SET connection_type='Professional' WHERE from_id=5 AND to_id=10 AND connection_date='2022-08-15';
UPDATE nomads_contacts SET job_title='Software Engineer' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE nomads_connections SET status='Connected' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE nomads_contacts SET email='john.doe@example.com', job_title='Senior Developer' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE nomads_interests SET interest='Machine Learning' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE digital_nomads SET location = 'Bali' WHERE name = 'Alice';
UPDATE remote_workers SET skills = 'Python, Java, SQL', experience_years = 5 WHERE occupation = 'Software Engineer';
UPDATE digital_nomads SET email = 'newemail@example.com', location = 'New York' WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE remote_workers SET occupation = 'Software Developer', skills = 'Python, JavaScript, SQL', experience_years = 5 WHERE id = 456;
UPDATE digital_nomads_contacts SET first_name='Alice', email='alice@example.com' WHERE contact_id=1;
UPDATE coworking_spaces SET amenities='High-speed internet, Free coffee' WHERE space_id=3;
UPDATE digital_nomads_contacts SET first_name='Alice', last_name='Smith', email='alice.smith@example.com' WHERE contact_id=1;
UPDATE coworking_spaces SET location='New York City', capacity=50, amenities='High-speed internet, coffee shop' WHERE space_id=3;
